TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 604
TEI.2.document_recipient: Stephen F Austin and Samuel M Williams
TEI.2.document_title: Jose Maria Viesca to Stephen F Austin and Samuel M Williams, 02-25-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Maria Viesca to Austin and Williams, February 25, 1831. Grant to settle 800 families of Mexicans and foreigners. Part of the territory granted includes that of the Nashville Co. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 604

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José Maria Viesca to Austin and Williams, February 25, 1831. Grant to settle 800 families of Mexicans and foreigners. Part of the territory granted includes that of the Nashville Co. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
